title_narrative: UNDP Nature Pledge Delivery Project (Portfolio Coordination and Cross-Cutting Themes project) 01002568
document_link_url: https://undpngddlsprod01.blob.core.windows.net/pdc/01002568-PPMNote to File Nature Pledge global project set up June 2024.docx.pdf
description_narrative: To amplify the transformational impact of the Nature Pledge activities the Project will integrate cross-cutting themes such as institutional capacity building; gender equality and inclusivity; knowledge management, communication and awareness building; data and digital transformation; sound management of social and environmental risks; south-south and triangular cooperation within and across the Nature Pledge portfolio.
document_link_title_narrative: Nature Pledge Project Document June 2024 signed
Nature Pledge Project Document June 2024 signed
Nature Pledge Project Document June 2024 signed
conditions_condition_narrative: The Implementing Partner shall ensure that all of its obligations set forth under the section entitled “Legal Context and/or Risk Management Standard Clauses” are passed on to each responsible party, subcontractor and sub-recipient and that all the clauses under this section entitled “Risk Management” are included, mutatis mutandis, in all sub-contracts or sub-agreements entered into further to the Project Document

Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
